title: PICK_RANDOM_ARRAY_ELEMENT Operation
description: Picks a random element from an array field in a component

entity_ref.description: Reference to the entity containing the component (supports 'actor', 'target', {entityId: ...}, or context references)

component_type.description: The component type ID containing the array (e.g., 'locations:exits')

array_field.description: Optional property path to the array within the component. If omitted, assumes the component data itself is the array or has an 'exits' field for locations:exits.

result_variable.description: Variable name to store the selected element (or null if array is empty/missing)
